Opinion

opinions.author: Per Curiam,

opinions.text:
Dissenting Opinion by
Mr. Justice Roberts :
In my view, the entry of nonsuit by the chancellor in favor of George Calantoni & Sons, Inc., was error. I would vacate the decree of nonsuit with respect to the corporate defendant and remand for further proceedings.
